Dec. 2005 | population_density_km2 = 4743 | population_note = | timezone = | utc_offset = | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = | postal_code_type = | postal_code = | area_code = | blank_name = District Number | blank_info = 12 | blank1_name = Quarters | blank1_info = Schwamendingen Mitte Saatlen Hirzenbach | website = | footnotes = }} Schwamendingen is a quarter in Zürich, Switzerland. It is District number 12. The district has the quarters Schwamendingen Mitte, Saatlen and Hirzenbach. Until 1934 it was a municipality on its own. It was then incorporated into Zürich. Category:Former municipalities of Zürich Category:Quarters of Zürich
